string.text: On the night of 26 April 1986, the reactor of Unit 4 of the power unit The Chernobyl nuclear power plant collapsed as a result of a powerful thermal explosion. Radioactive dust picked up by the wind has partially fallen on the area USSR, left radiation chegis in Europe and even reached the shores of America.

In a changed environment, the National Security Council Ukraine's defence has decided to immediately carry out of special operation "Farwater." Guided by the anomalous maps we've drawn up in advance fields, dozens of military helicopters with paratroopers on board are on a course for an emergency. Despite meticulous preparations, the operation came to an end a failure. None of the vehicles returned to base.
To find out the reasons for the failure of the operation, a team was sent to the zone SBU officer Major Degtyarev is a former experienced stalker.
He begins his journey into the Deepzones.
In an attempt to learn something, the dictator talks to everyone encountered by the stalkers. It's all for nothing. They're either stubbornly silent or they really don't have anything is not known.
The Zone never tires of reminding you that it's not to be trifled with a day goes by without an attack by mutants or worse, humans.

The reports from the centre do not clarify anything, reliably all we know are the coordinates of the crash sites of the five helicopters. A few kilometres away from the emergency, the radio goes completely silent.
Dicterev remains alone.
The consequences of the accident were so severe, that the government of the Soviet Union was forced to hold urgent evacuation of nearby communities.
Contaminated areas within 30 kilometres of the plant have become a heavily guarded zone of total exclusion.

After erecting a reinforced concrete sarcophagus over the destroyed anargoblock, the operation of the Emergency has resumed. Availability of a powerful energy source and lack of population made it possible to create a complex in a closed area secret labs.

On 10 June 2006, the area was suddenly illuminated by an unbearable with light. For a few moments there was complete silence and it was apparent as the clouds evaporate in the sky. Then came a terrible rumble, the earth shook. Most of the troops guarding the perimeter instantly are dead.
2007. Scientists still can't come up with a clear explanation to what happened. Expeditions invariably end in tragedy. Rare survivors tell tales of mutant animals possessing with astonishing powers.

2009. In the territory of the exclusion zone, according to various estimates there are between one and three hundred unaccounted persons present. These people call themselves stalkers and they're in the business mainly by searching for so-called artefacts, anomalies of entities that could fetch a substantial amount of money money.
2010, despite the perimeter cordons, stalkerism is gaining momentum, but only the fringes have been explored zones. Attempts to penetrate to its centre fail.

In 2012, a Stalker nicknamed "Strelok" solved a mystery a mind-burner, a powerful emitter capable of destroying man's mind and shut it down. The Stalkers then rushed en masse towards the centre of the zone. Some were looking for a legendary trove of artefacts, others an equally legendary wish granter.
The central laboratory X-8 is mentioned here, it may contain information about secret experiments on the territory of the zone, our analysts have been interested in this issue for a long time.
Stalkers, be advised, Skadovsk is under attack. We're battening down the hatches until things calm down.
You might want to put the guns away, man, we're camping here.
You should put the gun away, man! We're camping here!
Man, this place is quiet, so keep it quiet and hide the gun.
Man, this place is quiet, so keep it quiet and hide the gun.
You'll be out in the field with a gun, and this is a camp. You know the difference?
You'll be out in the field with a gun. And there's a camp here. Can you tell the difference?
Missing_Subtitle
Subtitles by A. Semkin
Missing_Subtitle
Stalkers, attention! I'd like to inform you that the doors to the kodosk are once again open to you.
All right! Here's the dough!
Okay, guys, thank God the ejection is over. I hope nobody got hurt.
Anything interesting, come on in. Our Skadovsk is always in place, it won't go anywhere.
Find the artefacts? Come on in, let's have a look.
Is that it? The exit's over there.
Go on, go on, I've got enough to worry about without leeches.
Well, hello! What brings you to our boat?
As they say, welcome aboard our swamp icebreaker.
The ship's long gone, but the rats are on board they're not all dead. What are you here for?
What do you want?
Stalkers, be advised! There's an ejection! Repeat, we have an ejection! I advise everyone to seek shelter immediately!
The odds are roaring, the ejection will start any minute now, look for a deep hole if you want to live.

Apparently the crew was killed in mid-air, the helicopter was falling out of control. Brother's computer was luckier. Okay, let's see what's useful. Yeah, maps of the area with some kind of markings. It'll come in handy.
It's the same with the electronics here, with the ejection protection system intact. Hmm, what was that?
All the electronics inside were on fire, even the insulation on the wires melted.
Oh, now come and have a chat.
Oh, now come and have a chat.
One!
KAS!
TWO!
TWA!
THREE!
With olan!
Hide the gun!
Hide the gun!
Hide the gun, I say! I'll make it three!
Hide the chair, I say. I count that as three.
Don't want to talk, go talk to the commander.
If there's anything you need, you talk to him.
Don't you get it? Get back! I'll blow your brains out!
Don't you get it? Get back! I'll blow your brains out!
All right, let's go back! There was no help for you, so don't expect a reward.
That's it! Let's go back! You've been no help at all, so don't expect a reward.
It's not for me. Talk to the older man.
Everywhere I've asked, it's all up my arse, isn't it? No rumours at all, like he never existed.
Okay, guys, we've done our job, we're going back. And don't forget to stop by the Beastmaster's on Janova. You tell him that the wounded chimera's flippered. And you'll get your share.
Okay, guys, we've done our job, we're going back. And don't forget to stop by the Beastmaster's on Janova. You tell him that the wounded chimera's flippered. And you'll get your share.
Wow! Very, very much so! Hey, have you thought about becoming a chimera hunter?
That's right! Very, very much so! Hey, have you thought about becoming a chimera hunter?
Okay, we're here. It's close, man, it's fucking close I can feel it. Whoever sees her, hit the head. Close you can't go near it. Chimera sniffing. Even in his sleep at full power.

Anyway, here's the plan. The chimera, it hunts at night, and so by morning, it's gone vlogging snooze. You can catch her at dawn, she's just about to be will go to rest. We'll crawl in closer and finish her off while she's drinking in two holes. Anyway, we just need to get together early, cross paths I suggest 3:00 a.m. at the bar.
We need to approach discreetly. We can't let her smell us in any way.
Go back to sleep, you crab, come on!
That bastard's gonna wish he'd run away.
Did you find out what the magpies are up to?
It's all right. The doctor said you'll be able to run in a couple of days. Bye, go lie down, get your strength back, you'll need it.
Hey, Stalker, I got a question for you!
Now turn round. Turn round, I said. You're slow. And get out of here before they let you eat meat. You got it?
Now turn round. Turn round, I said. You're slow. And get out of here before they let you back in. You got it?
Don't you get it, Asshole? Fuck off!
Don't you get it, Catlina? Wishing for a shortcut!
Are you out of your mind? I'll get you, you bastard!
Are you out of your fucking mind? I'm gonna get you, bluesy!
Now, bitch, you're gonna give me everything!
Now, bitch, you're gonna give me everything!
I'll fucking kill you, bitch!
I'll fucking kill you, bitch!
You're a freak, genius artefact!
You're a freak, genius artefact!
You arsehole!
That's it, don't move, you goat, unless you want to go in the pen!
Stay where you are, put the gun away and don't move, you understand?
Barda, look what I found on the old boat. Will it work?
Yeah, it's a lovely thing. No one's ever brought one of these before. Here, get to work.
Yeah, well, more work will happen. You know where to find me?
Scratch, scratch, you'll get some more for treating your mate like that.
Oh, it's you! I need the money, you know, as much as you do!
Aah, that's it, the end has come, it's come, mutants, only mutants!
When the mutants come out of the woodwork, this stuff won't help you! Here you go and get out of here!
Ha! You think it's gonna protect you from being thrown out? Here, take this! And get out of here! Save your skin!
So why don't you get out of here, psycho?
Get out of here, you fucking mutants!
Get out of here, I'm going to shoot them all!
Mutants, he's out of here, motherfuckers!
Get off!
Go where you're going!
Get out!
Watch me carefully as I go, then move yourself.
What a great burn! Well, you come round if you need to!
Yeah, there you are, you fucking mutants. You crawled up there and you think Noik can't get to you? Ha, I see you're not aware that I have my own personal go to near North Hooter.
Well, good luck to you!
Fair winds!
Hello!
Hello, stalker!

Record number twelve. The study will be over soon. The camp is already starting to suspect something. Grouse agreed with Danila to go after the bloodsuckers. I wonder when they'll figure it out. Okay, we need to regurgitate the blood jars. Recognise which ones are infected and hide the rest. Someone's coming. Record number thirteen. Probably the last one. It's all skewed. First that curious idiot of a hunter is now a grouse. It's naive to expect me to get away with this. They're coming for me. However, ha ha ha. Current essence and difference. Gimma globin addiction is about to eat me up. Let them shoot you. It's better than dying of disease.
Yeah, yeah, goodbye, goodbye.
Yeah, goodbye.
What is it, radiation wounds?
just not right now. I'm listening.
I knew I'd be exposed, and you must have a lot of questions to me. Ask.
So the data from the on-board aha narrow tatri failed both engines so what do we have here another map with the estimated evacuation points marked on it b2 b28 b205 interesting
Order fulfilled! Here's the artefact!
The order is ready, here's the artefact.
It's me, Cheese. Drop by my place if you got something to talk about. It's urgent. It's about our case.
Go, go, there's nothing for you to do here
Come on, come on, don't be long!
So, anything new?
What are you doing? If you've got something, put it out, if not, get out.
Wow, that's a gun! Look, show me!
I saw the bloodsucker enter the building. I think it's analogue in there. Look, let's check it out, shall we?
Look out for another one!
Did you hear that? Okay, it's nothing.
Shit, they're waking up! Let's get out of here!
Oh, shit, are there a lot of bloodsuckers sleeping in here? Let's do it on tiptoe, so there's no noise and no dust.
Look, there's probably a way into the basement right there.
Talent, Gritz, you can't beat it. Let's go take a look.
You didn't bruise your knees, did you? All right, let's go. Let's check the premises.
Ehhhhhhh, it's been a while. That's a hell of a quiet time.
I think I've got a lock on the Lair. Get over here!
Watch where you're shooting!
Fucking hell, you hit me!
So, what's the only thing to do now is jump? Follow me!
That's the way out! Jump!
Yeah, I'm ready. But I've seen two, so keep your ears open, all right?
I think that's it. This is the last one.
Watch carefully, they can come from anywhere.
There is no hunter among them. Oh, look at that. There's claw marks. It never happened on the ones we found before. That's weird.
Look at the weirdness of it, claw marks.
It wasn't like this on the previous tollbooths.
Okay, Danila's not here. Let's get out of here.
Something, there's something. Cover me, yeah!
Get down!

Okay, Danila's results came back negative. I have an idea where he is now. I'll check it out, we'll be in touch. Now you tell the people about the fucking suckers. Something needs to be done about them.
I'll have to get my beard on it. He knows how to deal with creatures like that.
My speciality. Yeah, and I'm pretty good at hacking, huh?

Now I'm sure the artefact isn't down there. It must be in the tree itself. I think you can climb it from the hill. As long as there are no monsters. Oh, shawl, after the fight with the gimbal and the barge, I had to come here alone. By the time I get the artefact, they'll know who to listen to.
What's up, Stalker?
What do you want?
You're, um. Howl!
Mmm, come on, uh, let me sleep, uh, be a man.
Well, excuse me, there's a bloody spattering.
Dum, there, you pour!
Stop! You're on a press matter!
Awww, you Ha-ha-ha-ha Well, come on in
What? 602? No way.
Missing_Subtitle
I say, low energy, low energy.
Missing_Subtitle
Guys, where to? No way! That leaves me! I'm staying!
Mmm, great!
You know, so your hands don't shake.
Is it to get the job done?
Well, here's to the common cause!
All right, let's finish this, freak!
All right, let's finish this, freak!
Turn your globes, stalker. There's nothing for you to do here.
Turn your globes, Stalker. There's nothing for you to do here.
Stalker, get out of here before they pull your legs out!
Stalker, get out of here before they pull your legs out.
Get out of here, man!
Leave while you're still in one piece.

Kardan is an old alky, he gets drunk, but he can't tear off chairs. Well, what about it? We need to take a better look around. Bullshit, you fool. He's got us jokers on our backs, we're young, we don't know a damn thing. And the joker is good, too. He got offended, grabbed it in his rucksack, and was done for. While I was calming the gimbal down, took off in an unknown direction. What am I supposed to do, drink with the old goat? And the vodka is crap. It was off to a great start.
Greetings, Stalker! Decided to place an order?
Hey! Decided to order something?
Hi! Do you need any merchandise?
There'll be stuff, don't worry, just later.
Come back later! The goods haven't arrived yet!
The order's not ready yet, so come back later, okay?
Order completed, pick up the goods!
I can be picked up.
Take the goods, Stalker. I've done my job.
Order fulfilled. You can pick up the goods.
That's it, Fralnia, let's get out of here while we're good! Or we'll change our minds!
That's it, Fral, Natalia, let's get out of here while we're good. Or we'll change our minds!
What are you doing here? I told you to get out of here, besta!
What are you so cheerful about? What did you say? Get out of here, Best!
No, you've got the roms all mixed up, Mudam, and I'm gonna kill you, you're gonna kill me!
No, you've got it all wrong, Mudam, and I'm going to kill you, you understand me?
Freeze, dummy! Freeze, or I'll kill you, you've eaten!
Freeze, dummy! Freeze, or I'll kill you, you've eaten!
Brothers! He has no respect for us! Fuck him!
Bros, you're no respecter of persons, we lied over there!
He's greedy, he won't give Valina back!
Leo, he's greedy, man! He won't give Valina back!
Opa-cha! That's the guy with the big wave! You hear me? Don't fish, don't fish!
Hey, you're standing there, I told you! I'm gonna get my own grill!
Hey, you stop, I said! I'm gonna get my own grill!
Don't be afraid! Come on, come on, let's go!
See? I told you the jumpsuit would hold up. Move on.
Stalker, help!
Hey, what the fuck is that?
Anyway, there's Malekha's artefacts, more of them to bring in we can. And we're gonna need skids and gear that'll do the trick you did.
You tail led arseholes!
Show me what?
Anyway, that's right, boys, what you got, I got too. Trellises and gear are not an issue. Quality, as always, you won't find better.
Malchite them, I don't need witnesses!
There they are!
Valimseur!
Waiting here, the clients are about to show up.
I'm talking to you, Stalker.
I'm talking to you, Stalker.
Who else is there?
Yeah, well, that makes sense. Let's take 'em down!
Yeah, well, that makes sense. Let's take 'em down!
Ask Starshov.
Don't let them see you!
Don't let them see you!
Stalker, what the fuck?
Brothers! Valims!
We'll cross paths when we're alive!
You get on with it! We'll have a chat!
Whoa! He's here!
And who's doing this to us?
BLEEP!
What's the matter with you? We've been waiting for you for ages!
What are you so excited about? We've been waiting for you for ages!
What the hell? They're kind of hiding, aren't they?
You hear that? The Sultan has a shorter conversation!
That's it, that's it, we're done! What did you see, Ermolena?
That's it! We're soaked! You really did a great job on them!
All mine!
Quiet, boys!
Neses! We're it! We're the fucking brigades!
BLEEP!
They got you, you bastards! You don't seem too keen on fighting!
We got the bastards! Thanks for your help!
